content: I have written an article noting the aging fact being felt hard by IHE, which is an opportunity for new participation and thinking. Please consider participation in IHE https://healthcaresecprivacy.blogspot.com/2019/05/the-graying-retirements-and-renewal-at.html
Unfortunately I dont work for an organisation that is a member and you dont do personal membership..

Unfortunately I dont work for an organisation that is a member and you dont do personal membership..

You can participate without being a member. All the meetings are open, as are the mailing lists. Welcome to play along.
